
Configuracion Ideal de resolucion :
1920 x 1080

Agregar al final el config.txt

# uncomment this if your display has a black border of unused pixels visible
# and your display can output without overscan
disable_overscan=1

#dtoverlay=vc4-fkms-v3d

hdmi_enable_4kp60=1

# NOOBS Auto-generated Settings:
start_x=1
disable_touchscreen=0

#gpu_mem=92

max_usb_current=1

hdmi_force_hotplug=1

config_hdmi_boost=10

# Si esto queda mal configurado puede afectar el servicio de connexiond e la red
hdmi_group=2
hdmi_mode=82
hdmi_drive=1

#framebuffer_width=1920
#framebuffer_height=1080

hdmi_cvt 1920 1080 50 6 0 0 0
enable_uart=1



http://www.lcdwiki.com/7inch_HDMI_Display-C

----------------------------------------------------------

Mas configurcion 
https://www.circuitbasics.com/raspberry-pi-touchscreen-calibration-screen-rotation/
